title: NEW COMMUNITY DISCORD FOR EUWEST

embed.title: Discord - Free voice and text chat for gamers
embed.description: Step up your game with a modern voice & text chat app. Crystal clear voice, multiple server and channel support, mobile apps, and more. Get your free server now!

body:
Hello, we have created a new Discord server that is available to everyone in Eu-west. This should not be a substitute for the boards, rather a supplement.
Everyone can search for fellow players or just talk about everything around LoL. We also do Giveaways or launch little turnaments where  you get reward.
If you invite your friends to this discord you will get rewards too.
See ya :D
